mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applyment SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId = #{relId}, displayStatus = 1
mapper.select: SELECT AM.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM applyment AS AM INNER JOIN member AS M ON AM.memberId = M.id WHERE AM.id = #{id} AND AM.displayStatus = 1 AND AM.id = #{id}
